title: Cafe Greg - Gan Ha'Ir
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Israeli, Kosher, Non-veg
description: Serves fish, veg options available. In the Gan Ha'Ir shopping mall with plenty of seating. Offers a separate vegan menu that includes breakfast, sandwiches, stir-fries, salads. Closes 1 hour before Shabbat begins on Friday afternoon, and re-opens Saturday night 1 hour after Shabbat ends. Kosher (Mehadrin).
